articles.author: Carmen Paun, Seb Starcevic
articles.title: Reformist leader rallies Romanians to beat back surging pro-Russia hard right - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Presidential candidate Elena Lasconi warns of an “an existential fight for Romania’s democracy.”
articles.content: Lasconi said Georgescu, who has campaigned on reducing imports and increasing Romanian domestic food and energy production, wanted to unhitch Romania from the European and international financial mai… [+1936 chars]
